name: Rush (itch) (Marphox)
description:
Rush is a goofy two-player arcade  inspired platformer, where the goal is to reach the end of the level first. Both players plays on the same stage, as they have to avoid silly penguins and weird looking moles on their way to the goal.

Be careful with the enemies, as they can knock you back. However you can jump on them to get an extra bounce. You can even bounce on your rivals head!
 
 

Controls:

Player 1 Controls:

A and D to move left and right

Space bar to jump

 

Player 2 Controls

Left and right arrow keys to move left and right

Up arrow to jump
